text: Korean Mongolian or Mongolian Korean may refer to: *Mongol invasions of Korea, 1231–1270, a series of campaigns by the Mongol Empire against the Kingdom of Goryeo *North Korea-Mongolia relations, the historic and current bilateral relations between Mongolia and North Korea *South Korea-Mongolia relations, foreign relations between South Korea and the Mongolia *Koreans in Mongolia, one of the Korean diaspora communities in Asia *Mongolians in South Korea, the world's largest population of Mongolian citizens abroad *Multiethnic people of mixed Korean and Mongolian descent
title: Korean Mongolian
